Table of Contents

NAME

segments

SYNOPSIS

DESCRIPTION

removes the specified message queues, semaphores and shared memory segments. These System V IPC objects can be specified by their creation id or any associated key. The following options are used to specify which IPC objects will be removed. Any number and combination of these options can be used: Remove the message queue associated with the id from the system. Mark the shared memory segment associated with id for removal. This marked segment will be destroyed after the last detach. Removes the semaphore set associated with id from the system. Remove the message queue associated with key from the system. Mark the shared memory segment associated with key for removal. This marked segment will be destroyed after the last detach. Remove the semaphore set associated with key from the system. The identifiers and keys associated with these System V IPC objects can be determined by using
